sentence.Network_en: I, in my turn, became embarrassed and huffy and told her to take the money back.
sentence.Network_cn: 这下轮到我既尴尬又气愤了，我告诉她把钱拿回去。

sentence.Network_en: He did not seem seriously angry. He only acted as if he were huffy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他并不像是真生气, 他只是装出一副恼怒的样子.

entry.def: Someone who is huffy is obviously annoyed or offended about something.

example.ex: I, in my turn, became embarrassed and huffy and told her to take the money back.
example.tran: 这下轮到我既尴尬又气愤了，我告诉她把钱拿回去。

sentences.sentence: "stayed huffy a good while"- Mark Twain
"she gets mad when you wake her up so early"
